text: Terry Boyes (1936-2017), was a male swimmer who competed for England. ==Swimming career== He represented England in the 440 yards freestyle at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He was a member of the York City Baths Club and an engraver by trade. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:English male swimmers Category:Swimmers at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Terry Boyes
